website_summaries.verdict: Easy to maneuver 18-inch luggage set with spinner wheels and an ergonomic handle. Unisex kid-friendly design.
pros: High-quality wheels designed to hold up against heavy wear, even on tarmac, without shredding
Telescopic handle is adjustable to 3 heights
Can hold a weekend’s worth of clothing with room to spare for toys, accessories, or snacks
cons: Some quality concerns with telescopic handle, which seems somewhat flimsy and could get stuck if overextended

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old for travel. It has a lot of space! We travel quite often on 3-4 day trips. I was able to 5-6 days worth of outfits, 4 pairs of pajamas, and lots of underwear and socks. I also was able to fit a few pairs of shoes as well. There is a zipper pocket that can hold more clothes. In our case I use that to hold his toiletries. When we aren’t using it for travel he would use it to pack his toys and play in. It his highly durable. The fun graphics on it is great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Krysthel

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old 1400 miles first trip!
customer_reviews.text: This carry on got so many compliments from fellow travelers! I loved that it has 4 wheels; my 4 year old navigated easily through the airport with it. The extending handle on it makes me nervous; seems cheap and I fear it will break in the future. The rest of the suitcase seems so much more durable than the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice but doesn’t  hold much
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute set. Ordered it for 3 year old. Nice and sturdy but the suitcase doesn’t hold much. Good for carry on to store extra entertainment items for children. Backpack is only good for snacks. Child loved having his own luggage. It’s sturdy and was easy for him to maneuver the carry on. He loved the backpack. Only issue was the size of the “luggage” - I should have paid attention to the dimensions. Going to try to locate the bigger size to add to these pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Loves deals

customer_reviews.title: Independent traveler
customer_reviews.text: We're on trip#3 with this set now. My 2yo loves having his own suitcase. On the 1st flight, the airlines returned it with one of the wheels smooshed into the corner of the bag. I could pop it out easily enough with my hands and the wheels all still roll well enough, but there's a bit of visual damage which remains. The backpack easily fits 3small playdough tubs, 2 board books, 6 diapers, wipes, a milk cup and a small toy (current contents in mine). The suitcase fits winter clothes for 1 week:(jacket, shirts, pants, sweatshirts, socks, shoes, jammies and toiletries for 1 week).
customer_reviews.author: Deck the Halls

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my son. We travel a lot by plane and car and we both love it. He gets to be a little man and I get to have at least one free hand.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Alejandra Cortez Tartaglia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is sooo cute and looks sturdy, very attractive and good quality. My little one loves it and can't wait to start our vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Lili Wang

customer_reviews.title: Five years old love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage. The size and color are just great for my five year old son. He is super excited for the upcoming trip with the new luggage. It is light and easy to move around. The one thing I care a lot is maneuverability. You can see from the video that it is definitely easy enough for a kid to handle. Love it.:)
customer_reviews.author: Vicky L

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Works great for weekend travel.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my 5 year old grandson. This works great for a few days clothes an toys for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light my grandson loves it but not practical
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long it’s going to last would not put it through luggage check very light
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my 5 year old to wheel around by himself and perfect for packing up a few days worth of outfits. Does it's job and is compact and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Shaye

customer_reviews.title: Child Friendly
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are really great. He now feels that he has his own travel case and he can identify it as different from his Parents suitcases.
customer_reviews.author: Laurieanne Marrell

customer_reviews.title: He loved it...his very own luggage.
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present. Now he has luggage just like his sisters. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase for a great price
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this case for my nephew who love cars and he loved it! it have so much room it and it's very easy doe him to maneuver on his! great purchase
customer_reviews.author: shamecca easterling

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: So easy for my 4 year old to push around. Light and only minimal scuffing after checking.
customer_reviews.author: Jeans05

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved his own suitcase and book bag. The suitcase was roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Miles

customer_reviews.title: impressed
customer_reviews.text: its a hard case bought it for my some he loves it and the back pack is very cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Khuram Ali Paracha

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy suitcase. My toddler really enjoyed travelling with this. The handle occasionally gets stuck but works great most of the time
customer_reviews.author: MVP

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but damaged - not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This luggage looked cute, until I opened it. It has a stain as if it was returned already. For this price, this isn’t acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Karanovic

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Tiny can be used as personal item on the plane .
customer_reviews.author: anel uribe

customer_reviews.title: Grandson who is only 2 loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Would never “check” this bag, but great carry on for children.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gail Helt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loved his own luggage. Perfect size for a child yet big enough to keep all his clothes in.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Childs

NAME: Winsday 18" Kids Luggage

Extremely lovable pattern, we promise your family(especially kids) will love it.

Lightweight but durable: The 360 degree wheels assure exceptional.

maneuverability and keep zero weight on kids' arm.

Even times go by, it still looks new and beautiful.

Convenient and easy for cleaning: Waterproofing material quality is advantageous for cleaning, so long as gently wipes, then maintains cleanly.

Main compartment with high capacity

Ergonomically designed telescoping handle, kids can pull it easily. Widely fit for traveling, outdoor activities.

We offer you 100% risk-free satisfaction guarantee to let you buy with confidence.

We are quite sure that you will be super-impressed with durability and high quality of our kids luggage kit.

【Light material】Being light makes it easy to be pushed or pulled around.
【360 Spinner Wheels】4 Spinner wheels provide effortless maneuverability & smooth gliding.
【Lovely Pattern】Lovable and colorful prints make it a stylish accessory for kids.
